21 Charlene Shepherd

Position Forward

Height 6-2

Class Graduate Student

Hometown Killeen, Texas

Highschool Shoemaker High School

Prev School University of North Texas

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2020-21 (Junior at North Texas): Appeared in just three games, making one start…Averaged in 7.3 points and 5.2 rebounds…Finished with 22 points, 16 rebounds, three assists and two steals…Scored nine points on 4-of-6 shooting, had six rebounds and two assists at Louisiana (12/4)…Made start at Texas (11/29) and finished with six points, seven rebounds, a steal and an assist…Totaled seven points, three rebounds and a steal against Tarleton State (11/25).

2019-20 (Sophomore at North Texas): Played in 30 games, making six starts…Averaged 7.2 points and 5.2 rebounds…Recorded season bests in points (216) and rebounds (156), while adding 13 assists, 13 blocks and 16 steals…Scored in double figures eight times…Scored a career-high 24 points on 9-of-11 shooting against Texas-San Antonio (2/22)…Added 16 points, seven rebounds and a block at Texas-El Paso (1/25)…Scored 23 points and had nine rebounds against Marshall (1/4)…Pulled down a career-high 23 rebounds (second all-time in program history), had a career-high three blocks and scored 10 points to record a double-double against Western Kentucky (1/2)…Posted her first career double-double with 17 points and 15 rebounds against Texas A&M-Texarkana (12/29).

2018-19 (Freshman at North Texas): Averaged 5.6 points, and 3.6 rebounds…Tallied 190 points, 121 rebounds, 16 assists, nine steals and seven blocks…Reached double digits in scoring three times and pulled down a season-best nine rebounds three different times…Was named C-USA Freshman of the Week (2/18)…Scored 16 points and had seven rebounds against Florida International (2/16)…Recorded 15 points, four rebounds and two steals against Texas-San Antonio (1/12)…Hauled in nine rebounds, scored 14 points and had two assists and two steals against Oklahoma Panhandle (12/29)…Added 12 points and six rebounds against Houston Baptist (12/5)…Totaled 15 points and grabbed nine rebounds against Mid-America Christian (11/7).

High School: Was a three-year letter winner in basketball and volleyball at Shoemaker High…Served as a two-year captain on the basketball team and a three-year captain on the volleyball team…Was a three-time All-District selection in both basketball and volleyball…Also earned 2017 District MVP honors in volleyball as a senior…Set the school record for most single blocks in a volleyball game with 16.

Personal: Born on June 8, 2000…Daughter of Michael and Patricia Shepherd…Has two siblings, Michelle and Michael…Major is applied liberal arts…Career ambition is to become a detective or a high school or college coach…Hobbies include reading, eating, sleeping.
